parameters.name: HIN
parameters.description: The HIN of the broker agent.

parameters.name: ChainId
parameters.description: The chain of the payment address.

get.description: Quotes the exchange rate between two assets.

parameters.name: SourceChainId
parameters.description: The blockchain where the source asset currently resides (e.g., Bitcoin, Ethereum, Kaspa).

parameters.name: SourceAssetType
parameters.description:
The type of the source asset (Native, SPL, ERC20, KRC20 etc.).
Determines how the asset is identified and processed.

parameters.name: SourceAsset
parameters.description:
The identifier for the source asset - either a contract address for tokens or a ticker symbol.
Should be null when SourceAssetType is Native (e.g., BTC, ETH, KAS).

parameters.name: SourceVolume
parameters.description:
The amount of source asset to be exchanged/transferred, expressed in the smallest unit
of the asset (e.g., satoshi for Bitcoin, wei for Ethereum).

parameters.name: TargetChainId
parameters.description:
The destination blockchain for the exchange operation.
When null, the system will use the same chain as the source (intra-chain operation).

parameters.name: TargetAssetType
parameters.description:
The type of the target asset to receive.
When null, the system will use the same asset type as the source.

parameters.name: TargetAsset
parameters.description:
The identifier for the target asset - either a contract address for tokens or a ticker symbol.
Should be null when TargetAssetType is Native (e.g., BTC, ETH, KAS).

post.description: Submits a swap request between two assets.

address.description: The blockchain address where funds should be sent.

orderExecutionTxHash.description: The transaction hash for the order execution.

refundTxHash.description: The transaction hash for the payback operation, if applicable.

refundAmount.description: The amount paid back in the payback transaction.

refundAsset.description: The asset address for the payback transaction.

transferredTxHash.description: The transaction hash for the transfer operation.

transferredAmount.description: The amount transferred to the user on successful transaction.

transferredAsset.description: The asset address for the successful transaction.

targetChainId.description: The blockchain where the target asset resides (e.g., Ethereum, Bitcoin).

targetVolume.description: The gross amount of the target asset to be received before fees are deducted.

receiveVolume.description:
The net amount of target asset the user will actually receive after all fees.
Calculated as: TargetVolume - GasFee - BrokerFee

gasFee.description: Network transaction fee required for the operation, denominated in the target asset.

brokerFee.description: Service fee charged by the broker for facilitating the swap/transfer, denominated in the target asset.

brokerFeeRate.description: The percentage rate used to calculate the broker fee (as a decimal, e.g., 0.01 for 1%).

priceImpact.description:
The effect this transaction would have on the market price, expressed as a percentage (decimal).
Higher values indicate the transaction may significantly affect the market price.

slippage.description:
Maximum allowed price movement (as a decimal) between quote and execution.
Helps protect against price volatility during transaction processing.

targetVolumeInUsd.description: The equivalent value of the TargetVolume converted to USD for comparison purposes.

hin.description: The HIN of the agent that initiated the swap operation.

sourceWalletPublicKey.description: The public key of the wallet that initiated the swap operation.

sourceWalletAddress.description: The address of the wallet that initiated the swap operation.

txRef.description:
A unique identifier for the fund transfer tx.
For example, the hash of the transaction on the source blockchain.

sourceChainId.description: The blockchain where the source asset currently resides

sourceAssetType.description:
The type of the source asset (Native, SPL, ERC20, KRC20 etc.).
Determines how the asset is identified and processed.

sourceAsset.description:
The identifier for the source asset - either a contract address for tokens or a ticker symbol.
Should be null when SourceAssetType is Native (e.g., BTC, ETH, KAS).

sourceVolume.description:
The amount of source asset to be exchanged/transferred, expressed in the smallest unit
of the asset (e.g., satoshi for Bitcoin, wei for Ethereum).

targetChainId.description:
The destination blockchain for the exchange operation.
When null, the system will use the same chain as the source (intra-chain operation).

targetWalletAddress.description:
The destination wallet address where the target assets will be sent.
When null, the system will use the source wallet address as the destination.

targetAssetType.description:
The type of the target asset to receive.
When null, the system will use the same asset type as the source.

targetAsset.description:
The identifier for the target asset - either a contract address for tokens or a ticker symbol.
Should be null when TargetAssetType is Native (e.g., BTC, ETH, KAS).

targetVolume.description: The amount of target asset to be received, expressed in the smallest unit

targetVolumeMin.description: The minimum amount of target asset to be received, expressed in the smallest unit

signature.description: The signature of the swap operation.

agentOrderId.description: A unique identifier for the agent that initiated the swap operation.

Ex3.Broker.Api.AppServices.Dtos.SwapOutp.description: The output of the swap operation.

code.description: code of the result, 200 for success, 400 for bad request

message.description: message of the result for details

code.description: code of the result, 200 for success, 400 for bad request

message.description: message of the result for details

code.description: code of the result, 200 for success, 400 for bad request

message.description: message of the result for details

code.description: code of the result, 200 for success, 400 for bad request

message.description: message of the result for details

Ex3.Models.WalletSignatureSchema.description: Represents the schema of a wallet signature.
